boardgame.name: Neue Heimat
boardgame.description: Tactical bidding game about building the highest scoring houses in three building rows._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The levels are different coloured cubes with numbers from 1 to 6 on it, that are dealt via auction in each round. The first one of a new colour you purchase fixes this colour as yours for the rest of the game and the final scoring. Players also bid for additional pieces to shorten (or lengthen) the lanes and rooftops to finish the houses._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You pay with cheques, each of 1 million euros and can establish an _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;illegal cashbox_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, counting at the final scoring, too._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends, when there are two rows completed. The houses on these score positive points, regarding the numbers on the levels and the rooftops, the ones in the third row are scored negative._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Tough bidding game, unforgiving and rather deep for the way it looks. Klaus Zoch and some friends established an extra mini-publisher called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Chili-Games_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; for games like this, which don`t fit into the more family-fun-program of his Zoch-verlag._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

BRAND NEW from publisher! (And how they publish it is: a cool red box with no outside artwork or shrinkwrap.) German rules included. Full-color English rules are in the boardgamegeek file section. SHIPPING: USA: $10.95 shipping in USA. MULTIPLE ITEMS: I combine shipping! So look at my other games for sale. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re interested in any of my other games for sale, the additional shipping cost would only be about $3 per large game, or ~$1 per small/card game. MASSACHUSETTS: Local buyers may pick up orders of $25 or more in person, in Billerica or Cambridge. INTERNATIONAL: Please ask about international shipping costs before ordering. INSURANCE: You may add $1.35 for optional insurance. (Otherwise, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll just get Delivery Confirmation, but in the unlikely event that USPS lost or damaged the package, it would unfortunately be your loss.) PAYMENT: You may pay by PayPal.com (credit cards accepted) to karlhanf@comcast.net ; or by Google Checkout if you give me your email; or if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re patient, by mailing a check to me. Thank you! I await your payment or questions. Karl Hanf

For those that can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t wait for the reprint (or prefer the style of this edition). This game was never played (somehow I forgot I had 2nd copy all along). 1. Shipping is from 23113 (Midlothian, VA) and paid by the purchaser. If you want the game to be shipped outside of the USA, please geekmail me first. 2. Please geekmail me for shipping quote. I am willing to ship through any major carrier (USPS, FedEx, or UPS). Most people prefer USPS as their shipping costs are much more competitive. That being said, please keep in mind the constrained box sizes of priority/regional-boxes (It may not be possible to package the game super well, which could lead to some box damage in transport). 3. Please allow a few days for the games to be shipped. 4. In general, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m careful about the condition of my games but I am not a collector... I often discard advertisements and inserts. Furthermore, most played games were sleeved during play... but any sleeves will be remove before shipping. If you have any questions about the condition/edition/etc of a game, please don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t hesitate to ask.
